biotools.summary:
a structure informed clustering strategy for population stratification.

This package performs agglomerative hierarchical clustering with the Mahalanobis distance based Genetic Relationship Matrix (GRM) representing the population-level covariance (LD) for the genetic markers.

Genome-wide association studies (GWAS) have been extensively used to estimate the signed effects of trait-associated alleles and compute polygenic risk scores.
